body_html: have you seen https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/fe454464681b036ff7fed3e42c6bb541fa52dd7c/tensorflow/python/tools/graph_metrics.py ? It might not provide everything you want, and 'how much memory is needed' is a little hard to quantify, because you can trade off speed for memory.
